cgcloud__Job_Definition_List_Account__c.name: cgcloud__Job_Definition_List_Account__c
cgcloud__Job_Definition_List_Account__c.description: Stores the details of the relationship between job definition list and customer.

cgcloud__Excluded__c.description: Excludes the customer temporarily from the list of customers of the activity.

cgcloud__Sales_Org__c.description: Sales organization to which the account assignment of the activity (and the activity itself) belongs.
